verbose_text: ANGPT1, secreted from pericytes, activates TEK / TIE2 receptor to maintain endothelial quiescence or stabilization, whereas ANGPT2, secreted from endothelial cells themselves by VEGF or hypoxia signaling, inhibits TEK to promote endothelial activation or sprouting.
evidence: ANGPT1, secreted from pericytes, activates TEK/TIE2 receptor to maintain endothelial quiescence
